name: ABC Preschool Learning Educational Puzzles for Toddler - teachme the alphabet, shapes, animal & endless fun!
name_original: ABC Preschool Learning Educational Puzzles for Toddler - teachme the alphabet, shapes, animal & endless fun!
description:
Super fun educational games for young kids!! Learn shapes, colors, counting, telling time, and much much more!!

* 18 unique educational games!!
* Cute animated characters to help guide children throughout the learning games!
* Ability for parents to customize puzzle gameplay and difficulty
* Beautiful graphics and really engaging gameplay

Enjoy and help spread the word about this educational learning game!! Thanks so much!
